code: import React,{useState}from'react';import Expenses from'./components/Expenses';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DUMMY_EXPENSES=[{id:'e1',title:'Toilet Paper',amount:94.12,date:new Date(2020,7,14)},{id:'e2',title:'New TV',amount:799.49,date:new Date(2021,2,12)},{id:'e3',title:'Car Insurance',amount:294.67,date:new Date(2021,2,28)},{id:'e4',title:'New Desk (Wooden)',amount:450,date:new Date(2021,5,12)}];const App=()=>{const[expenses,setExpenses]=useState(DUMMY_EXPENSES);const addExpenseHandler=expense=>{setExpenses(prevExpenses=>[expense,...prevExpenses]);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Expenses,{items:expenses,onAddExpense:addExpenseHandler})});};export default App;
